content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command to browse a website for information on top attractions and activities in Africa. However, the website did not provide any relevant information. It is a Travel + Leisure magazine website that provides travel guides, tips, and news related to travel, and offers information on hotels, resorts, airlines, and cruises. The website has a search option and menu to help users find the information they need. The text also mentions the use of cookies to personalize the user experience.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "top attractions and activities to do in Africa"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://www.tripadvisor.com/Attractions-g293740-Activities-South_Africa.html", "https://africawanderlust.com/destinations/tourist-attractions-in-africa/", "https://www.tripadvisor.com/Attractions-g312578-Activities-Johannesburg_Greater_Johannesburg_Gauteng.html", "https://travel.usnews.com/rankings/best-african-and-middle-eastern-vacations/", "https://www.explorebranson.com/list/top-ten-attractions-branson", "https://www.touropia.com/tourist-attractions-in-namibia/", "https://www.planetware.com/africa/best-places-to-visit-saf-1-36.htm", "https://www.touropia.com/tourist-attractions-in-south-africa/"]'}]
"""
